entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #60441
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #60440
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60439
  • Blazor WebAssembly fails in Chrome Extensions (Manifest V3) due to reserved _framework folder and hash validation #60438
  • Blazor Hybrid: Blazor is not handling exceptions even inside a try/catch #60437
  • Blazor Server: Writing Cookies via IJSRuntime Fails, Antiforgery Token Decryption Exception #60436
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #60435

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #60428

Closed

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assignment to inherited field, bypassing an hiding field #35643
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite incorrectly adds to RecordsAffected for additional statements #35642
  • Scaffold-DBContext fails when Database connection string is moved to secrets.json in efcore 9.0.1 and 9.0.2 #35641

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding GestureRecognizer To Editor prevents focus on Android & iOS #27831
  • [Label] Certain style attributes not applied when using Label.FormattedText #27828
  • Random error (System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException (0x8001010E)) when executing or trying to hot reload MAUI Blazor Hybrid Application #27827

Closed

  • App crashes in the release mode on Android after updating to MAUI 9.0.40 #27832
  • Excessive Looping Due to Missing Longitude Validation in Location.shared.cs #27774
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS]Fix Page BackgroundImageSource scaling #27829
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Essentials] Longitude Validation #27784
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #27816
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • Fix concurrency issues and leak reliability #27815
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-drawing, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 11023072 #27789
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 4 #27561
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 9 #27743
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 10 #27751

  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 11 #27764

  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR5

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False Positive in Analyzer IDE0052 when ref Fields are involved #77251
  • Document how expensive `Compilation.GetSymbolsWithName()` is #77250

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove state type from 'move type' refactoring #77248
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Allow more of Razor to use Roslyn Lsp types #74597
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make `InterceptableLocation` implement `IEquatable<InterceptableLocation>` #77137
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Collection expression arguments: support [CollectionBuilder] factory methods #76998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add Copilot UI prototype to Semantic Search window #77222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Repo build crashing with DOTNET_HeapVerify=1 #112613
  • Thread.SetThreadPoolWorkerThreadName takes way too many CPU cycles #112608

Closed

  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs is broken on .NET Framework #111749
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]:Inject to GC #112601
  • Build of cross native components is not incremental #11852
  • runtest.py doesn't use stress modes on R2R crossgen'ed framework assemblies #12363
  • Wrong size used for vectorization check in BitArray #111558
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • SPMI: Ensure proper zero extension for `isObjectImmutable` and friends #112617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `BitConvertor` #112616
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unify struct arg morphing #112612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `WriteDoubleLittleEndian` in `NumericGraphemeInfo` #112611
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Start marking GVM as virtual #112610
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update DbDataSource.cs #112609
    area-System.Data, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove incompatible API from PKCS netstandard2.0 lib #112591
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 10.0.0
  • Avoid `Unsafe.As` in `RangeCharSearchValues` #112606
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fixed the issue of incorrect return value of PalVirtualAlloc #112579
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix size used for vectorization check in BitArray (#111558) #111564
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix build of windows arm64 crossdac #112553
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/9.0-staging] [mono][interp] Fix execution of delegate invoke wrapper with interpreter #111700
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 9.0.3
  • Implement ExportPkcs12 #112569
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Experiment] Clone blocks with bounds checks #112595
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • When generating Theory, wrap execution into try/catch #112031
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enhance escape analysis to understand `Span<T>` capture #112543
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix winarm64 crossdac build #112594
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize Min/Max paths with AVX10.2 intrinsics #112535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • dotnet watch - Failure in DeleteSubfolder test with polling #46454
  • aspnetcore build failure - Child node 7 exited prematurely #46398
  • [dotnet watch] Cannot open project Lib.fsproj because extension fsproj is not associated with a language #46378

  • Build failure in VMR Vertical Build Windows_x64: Downloading vswhere - Process cannot access sdk.txt because it is being used by another process #45809
  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
    10.0.1xx
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
    10.0.1xx
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
    10.0.1xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
    10.0.1xx
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    10.0.1xx
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
    10.0.1xx
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
    10.0.1xx
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
    10.0.1xx
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
    10.0.1xx
  • .net 9.0.2 aot #46882
  • dotnet watch run completely broken for F# #44908
  • dotnet format throws because it can't determine file encodings in 9.0.200 #46780

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Static web assets] Be more leanient when applying compression negotiation #45598
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
